Bam Adebayo had a terrific all-around bounce-back performance after an offensive clunker Monday night, tallying 19 points and nine rebounds on 9-of-14 shooting.

Others: The Miami Heat secured a critical 16-point win against the Golden State Warriors Tuesday.
The Heat entered Tuesday night off a double-overtime loss to the Sacramento Kings after blowing a 17-point fourth-quarter lead.
